name: church-music-scheduler-cron
description: Cron jobs for Church Music Pro

scripts.sync-google: node -e "fetch(process.env.NEXTAUTH_URL + '/api/google-calendar/sync', {method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ syncAll: true })}).then(r=>r.text()).then(t=>console.log(t)).catch(e=>{console.error(e); process.exit(1)})"
